name: Maine Lobster & Spinach Dip
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Every bite of this six-ingredient dip is filled with luscious lobster flavor. Mix sour cream, mayo, lemon juice and McCormick® Spinach Dip Mix together. Gently fold in lobster meat and top with scallions. Serve with water crackers and score big at this weekend's tailgate or football party.
ingredients: 1 package McCormick® Spinach Dip Seasoning Mix
½ cup cooked and shredded fresh Maine lobster meat
directions: Stir sour cream, mayonnaise, lemon juice, and seasoning mix in medium bowl until well blended
Add lobster meat; gently stir to blend
Refrigerate at least 1 hour to blend flavors
Stir dip and sprinkle with green onions before serving
